message.content:
cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DB, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the task of generating explainable recommendations, which is a common problem in the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The method proposed in the paper leverages external knowledge in the form of knowledge graphs, which is a common technique in information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). The joint ranking of items and knowledge graph entities is a typical problem in database systems (cs.DB). Finally, the use of natural language processing techniques to generate explanations is a common task in computational linguistics (cs.CL).
